verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> without <S%H8414>form<s%>, and <S%H922>void<s%>; and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> was upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%>. And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7363>moved<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>: and there was <S%H216>light<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>, <S%H3588>that<s%> it was <S%H2896>good<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H914>divided<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H996>from<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>. the light from: Heb. between the light and between the darkness

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H3117>Day<s%>, and the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3915>Night<s%>. And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>. And the evening: Heb. And the evening was, and the morning was

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let there be a <S%H7549>firmament<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and let it <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%>. firmament: Heb. expansion

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%>, and <S%H914>divided<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%>: and it was <S%H3651>so<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H8064>Heaven<s%>. And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> under the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> be gathered <S%H6960>together<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, and let the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land <S%H7200>appear<s%>: and it was so.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3004>dry<s%> land <S%H776>Earth<s%>; and the gathering <S%H4723>together<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> he <S%H3220>Seas<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> bring <S%H1876>forth<s%> <S%H1877>grass<s%>, the <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> is in itself, upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and it was so. grass: Heb. tender grass

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1877>grass<s%>, and <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H6213>yielding<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, whose <S%H2233>seed<s%> was in itself, after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good<s%>.
And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let there be <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3915>night<s%>; and let them be for <S%H226>signs<s%>, and for <S%H4150>seasons<s%>, and for <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H8141>years<s%>: the day: Heb. between the day and between the night
And let them be for <S%H3974>lights<s%> in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and it was so.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3974>lights<s%>; the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%>, and the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H3974>light<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%>: he made the <S%H3556>stars<s%> also. to rule the day: Heb. for the rule of the day, etc.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> them in the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>,

And to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over the <S%H3117>day<s%> and over the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and to <S%H914>divide<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> from the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good<s%>.
And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let the <S%H4325>waters<s%> bring forth <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> the moving <S%H8318>creature<s%> that <S%H5315>hath<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, and <S%H5775>fowl<s%> that may <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7549>firmament<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>. moving: or, creeping life: Heb. soul fowl: Heb. let fowl fly open: Heb. face of the firmament of heaven

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>whales<s%>, and every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moveth<s%>, which the <S%H4325>waters<s%> brought forth <S%H8317>abundantly<s%>, after their <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and every <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, and <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and let <S%H5775>fowl<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%>, and <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>: and it was so.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and every thing that <S%H7431>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H2896>good<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in our <S%H6754>image<s%>, after our <S%H1823>likeness<s%>: and let them have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and over the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and over the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and over every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in his own <S%H6754>image<s%>, in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> he him; <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> he them.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, and <S%H4390>replenish<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and subdue <S%H3533>it<s%>: and have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and over the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and over every living <S%H2416>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>moveth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>. moveth: Heb. creepeth

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2009>Behold<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you every <S%H6212>herb<s%> <S%H2232>bearing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, which is upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and every <S%H6086>tree<s%>, in the which is the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H2232>yielding<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>; to you it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for <S%H402>meat<s%>. bearing: Heb. seeding seed yielding: Heb. seeding seed

And to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and to every <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and to every thing that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, wherein there is <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H5315><s%>, I have given every <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> for <S%H402>meat<s%>: and it was so. life: Heb. a living soul

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> every thing <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and, behold, it was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>. And the <S%H6153>evening<s%> and the <S%H1242>morning<s%> were the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
